help-file.title: CRUSADER
help-file.content:
The Crusader Paladin's main focus is on damage, possessing the added ability to "Skewer" their enemies. They may also utilize their "Lay Hands" ability twice as much as an unspecialized Paladin.
Innate Abilities --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 30th level: 2x Lay Hands
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 41st level: Skewer
